summary: The romantic and chivalrous adventures of adopted bastard Tom Jones in 18th-century England.
cast: George Devine|Rachel Kempson|Angela Baddeley|Joyce Redman|Jack MacGowran|Albert Finney|Diane Cilento|Wilfrid Lawson|John Moffatt|Peter Bull|David Warner|Freda Jackson|Redmond Phillips|Hugh Griffith|Susannah York|James Cairncross|Edith Evans|Patsy Rowlands|Mark Dignam|Julian Glover|Avis Bunnage|Rosalind Knight|Lynn Redgrave|George A. Cooper|Jack Stewart|Joan Greenwood|Rosalind Atkinson|David Tomlinson|Micheál MacLiammóir|Roberta Gibbs|Hilda Green|Mark Loosemore|Paddy Ryan|Catherine Willmer|Fred Wood
title: Tom Jones
